author: Juliano Haesbaert
title: RS anuncia devolução de ICMS para compras de eletrodomésticos pós-enchentes
text: Medida visa auxiliar famílias afetadas pelo desastre em maio O governador do Rio Grande do Sul, Eduardo Leite, revelou um novo programa para devolver parcial ou totalmente o ICMS pago na compra de eletrodomésticos essenciais por famílias atingidas pelas enchentes de maio. A devolução se aplica a fogões, geladeiras e máquinas de lavar ou secar adquiridos a partir de 1º de maio. A iniciativa está sendo finalizada e os detalhes serão comunicados em breve pela Receita Estadual. Aprovada pelo Confaz, a medida está em fase de operacionalização, com definição das regras e mecanismos de cruzamento de cadastros. Para usufruir do benefício, a nota fiscal deve conter o CPF do comprador e o código NCM do produto, além de ser emitida por estabelecimentos registrados no Estado. Integrado ao Plano Rio Grande, que abrange ações emergenciais e de reconstrução, o programa estipula limites específicos de reembolso por CPF e por item. A devolução do ICMS será total ou parcial, conforme o valor do produto, com um teto máximo de R$ 1 mil. O aplicativo Menor Preço Nota Gaúcha agora inclui uma lista especial para os eletrodomésticos beneficiados, ajudando as famílias a encontrar os melhores preços próximos. O aplicativo, que faz parte do programa Nota Fiscal Gaúcha (NFG), fornece informações atualizadas em tempo real, facilitando a escolha de onde comprar. Com a informação Governo do Estado do Rio Grande do Sul.

author: @mysuncoast
title: Manasota Key Road to get new facelift after being wiped away by storms
text:
Manasota Key Road to get new facelift after being wiped away by storms
SARASOTA, Fla. (WWSB) - What was once a beautiful stretch of Manasota Key Road in Sarasota was ravaged by back-to-back hurricane seasons in 2023 and 2024. Rubble remains littered on the beach during spring break nearly five months after the last storm.
Venice resident Diane Reidy tried to enjoy her beach day, but she can’t help but think of the inconveniences that lie ahead – during the construction of the new road – every time she looks at it. Diane is worried about the missing road delaying drive times to and from the area and the unsightly rubble on the beach.
The view might take a while to improve. The County saying says it’ll be years until a permanent road is built.
The Department of Transportation has an agreement with the county that design plans should be done around July 2027 – followed by another two years of construction.
And though it might take a while, Sarasota County Public Works Director Spencer Anderson wants to make sure the road is rebuilt better than ever.
Anderson will be meeting with commissioners on March 26 to discuss the plans further.
Copyright 2025 WWSB. All rights reserved.

author: Amaris Encinas
title: What does 12/31/23 mean? The last day of 2023 is an angel number
text: NYE 2023 is on a unique date that occurs once every 100 years: Here's what 12/31/23 means. [Amaris Encinas](https://www.usatoday.com/staff/5133245001/amaris-encinas/) The upcoming year will be filled with blessings, at least that is what the numerical sequence of this New Year’s Eve date suggests. If you take a closer look at the date, written as 12/31/23 or even 123123, you might see an angel number, which are [repeating number sequence](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/)s, often used as a guide for deeper spiritual exploration. The numerical sequences can range anywhere from [000](/story/life/2022/11/30/angel-number-000-meaning/10589434002/) to [999](/story/life/2023/01/30/angel-number-999-meaning/10806425002/), with each number having a distinct meaning and energy, USA Today previously [reported. ](/story/life/2022/11/06/what-are-angel-numbers-meanings-numerology/10525252002/) The once-in-a-century date, which won’t be seen again on our calenders until Dec. 31, 2123, marks a new beginning. One, that asks us to “transform and evolve with the times and in the right place to embrace what is coming to us,” [according to the Old Farmer’s Almanac website. ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) The date has also sparked an online trend, with TikTok users creating videos on the significance of the number and merchandise commemorating the date selling online, including on platforms like [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=123123&ref=cs_503_search), [eBay](https://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_trksid=p2332490.m570.l1313&_nkw=123123&_sacat=0) and [Etsy](https://www.etsy.com/market/123123?ref=seller_tag_bottom_image-1), the Detroit Free Press, part of the USA Today Network [reported.](/story/news/local/michigan/2023/12/27/angel-number-meaning-123123-last-day-year-numerology/72001298007/) Here’s what we know about the date. What does 12/31/23 signify within numerology? [Numerology is an ancient esoteric science](https://www.britannica.com/topic/numerology) that deals with numbers and letters and the energy, intention and vibration behind them, professional numerologist [Novalee Wilder](https://www.novaleewilder.com/) shared with USA Today earlier this month. "Before there was even language, there were numbers," she said. "Before we had named things, we had counted them, and we had assigned meaning to that count." The numbers that make up the angel number are just as important as the whole number, especially when you are trying to determine the vibration and intention behind the number. Professional astrologer [Narayana Montúfar](https://www.naramon.com/) told [ Farmer’s Almanac ](https://www.almanac.com/123123-meaning-123123) that the “Number 1 brings the very spark of initiation, 2 focuses on building, and 3 is related to the concept of creation. Together, the sequence of these three numbers speaks of the spark of initiation that seeks to build a new creation.” If you add all the numbers that make up the date 123123 together, you will come up with 12. The number 12 in numerology can symbolize spiritual enlightenment, with potential for the day to deliver epiphanies and “aha” moments for individuals and society at large, the website stated. FYI: [How to keep your pets calm during New Year's Eve fireworks](/story/graphics/2023/12/28/keep-dog-calm-new-years-eve-fireworks/71999504007/) What are some dates to keep in mind in 2024? If you are an angel number enthusiast, there are a few key dates you might want to keep in mind as 2024 rapidly approaches. A palindrome, not unlike an angel number, is a term typically reserved for words or phrases that are spelled the same way backward as they are forward. Words like level, kayak, civic, and radar are among some of the most common palindromes, according to the [Old Farmer’s Almanac. ](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486) Numerical sequences seen in dates or times can also be palindromes, the most well-recognized ones being 3/20/23 or [11:11](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/1111-good-luck-and-history), the website stated. Here are all palindrome dates that will occur in 2024, courtesy of the [Farmer’s Almanac](https://www.farmersalmanac.com/its-palindrome-day-14486): - 4/2/24 - 4/20/24 - 4/21/24 - 4/22/24 - 4/23/24 - 4/24/24 - 4/25/24 - 4/26/24 - 4/27/24 - 4/28/24 - 4/29/24 Contributing: Olivia Munson, USA Today 30 famous Capricorns you should know: [These celebrities belong to the winter Zodiac sign](/story/entertainment/celebrities/2023/11/29/famous-people-that-are-capricorns/71489302007/)

author: Jens Scharfenberg
title: Netgear Orbi 370: Neues WiFi‑7-System
text:
Mit dem Netgear Orbi 370 WiFi‑7 Mesh-System bringt der Netzwerkexperte ein neues Gadget in den Handel. Dieses setzt zwar auf WiFi 7, allerdings kommt dabei nur ein Dual-Band-System (2,4 GHz & 5 GHz) zum Einsatz. Auf das schnelle 6-GHz-Band muss man hier verzichten. Dafür kommt das System mit einem recht guten Preis.
Das Wichtigste in Kürze Netgear Orbi 370 bietet WiFi 7 über 2,4 GHz und 5 GHz mit Multi‑Link Operation (MLO) für stabile Verbindungen Unterstützt Mesh‑Betrieb und mehrere getrennte WLAN‑Netzwerke (z. B. für Gäste oder IoT) Bis zu ca. 120 m² pro Einheit, je acht Antennen, Quad‑Core‑CPU mit 1,5 GHz und 1 GB RAM Jeder Router/Satellit mit 2,5 Gbps‑Ethernet‑Port, WAN‑Port vorhanden Netgear Orbi 370: Was steckt technisch drin? Netgear stattet jeden Router und Satelliten des Orbi 370 mit acht internen Antennen, einem 1,5 GHz Quad‑Core‑Prozessor sowie 1 GB Arbeitsspeicher aus. Die Mesh‑Einheiten decken jeweils bis zu rund 120 m² ab, wobei die reale Reichweite von Raumgeometrie und baulichen Gegebenheiten beeinflusst wird. Das System ist ein Dual‑Band‑WiFi‑7‑Mesh. Ihr bekommt hier also die Frequenzbänder 2,4 GHz und 5 GHz geboten. Ein 6 GHz Band hingegen fehlt.
Wer das haben möchte, muss zu den höherpreisigen Modellen Orbi 770 ( € 499,99 * ) oder Orbi 970 ( € 1.986,00 * ) greifen. Dank Multi‑Link Operation (MLO) können Clients gleichzeitig über beide Bänder kommunizieren, was hohe Geschwindigkeiten, niedrigere Latenz und stabilere Übertragungen ermöglicht. Insgesamt ist WiFi 7 gegenüber WiFi 6 deutlich leistungsfähiger.
Mesh‑Netzwerk & Sicherheit Das Orbi 370 unterstützt Mesh‑Verbund mit mindestens einem Router und einem oder mehreren Satelliten. Durch die WiFi 7‑Funktionen kann selbst mit WiFi 6/6E‑Geräten ein spürbarer Vorteil in Stabilität und Leistung erreicht werden.
Neue Mehr‑Netzwerk‑Funktionalität erlaubt es, getrennte SSIDs einzurichten: etwa Gast‑Netzwerk, IoT‑Netzwerk, etc. Ein wichtiger Punkt ist der erhöhte Sicherheitsgewinn durch die Isolation von IoT‑Geräten (z. B. smarte Sensoren), die oft Sicherheitslücken aufweisen. Zusätzlich ist VPN‑Kompatibilität integriert, und die Verwaltung erfolgt komfortabel per App.
Preis und Verfügbarkeit Das Netgear Orbi 370 ist ein preisgünstiger Einstieg in WiFi 7‑Mesh-Technologie, ideal für Nutzer, die auf moderne Features wie MLO, getrennte WLAN‑Netze und Multi‑Gigabit‑LAN‑Ports setzen – ohne das teure High‑End‑Segment mit 6‑GHz‑Band. Hierzulande ist das Mesh-System noch nicht verfügbar. Doch US-Kunden können bereits jetzt zu einem Preis von knapp 250 US-Dollar für das Doppelpack zugreifen.
Bilder: Netgear
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: VNExplorer
title: Alvin Bragg Motion Sparks Dispute Between Matt Gaetz and Jim Jordan
text: Chairman Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) listens as ranking member Rep. Jerrold Nadler (D-NY) speaks during a House Judiciary Committee markup of the report "Recommending that the House of Representatives Cite Attorney General Merrick Garland for Contempt of Congress" at the Rayburn House Office Building on May 16, 2024 in Washington, DC. On June 13, 2024, a motion to subpoena Manhattan DA Alvin Bragg prompted a dispute between Jordan and Rep. Matt Gaetz. A motion to subpoena Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg sparked a clash between Republican Representatives Matt Gaetz and Jim Jordan. A House Judiciary Committee hearing was held on Thursday, as some Republicans have sought to investigate Bragg over his successful criminal case brought against former President Donald Trump, related to hush money paid to adult-film star Stormy Daniels in 2016. Shortly after the hearing began, Gaetz proposed a motion to subpoena Bragg and Assistant District Attorney Matthew Colangelo. New York Democratic Representative Jerry Nadler objected the motion, calling it "a little absurd," noting that Bragg and Colangelo agreed to appear before a hearing from the Judiciary Committee on July 12. "Mr. Bragg and Mr. Colangelo have agreed to come on the 12th ... If they don't show up on the 12th, they will be subpoenaed. I would ask the gentleman if he could withdraw the motion," Jordan said following Nadler's objection. Responding to his Republican colleague, Gaetz declined to remove his motion: "I've made a motion to subpoena these people now, pursuant to the rules, and I want to vote on my motion, or I want someone to move to table it." Jordan then attempted to halt a possible vote on the motion but the hearing went to recess shortly afterward. Upon returning, Gaetz announced that he was willing to withdraw his motion. In a statement to Newsweek, Gaetz said, "Chairman Jordan and Rep. Nadler firmly believe Bragg will show up and answer our questions without a subpoena." "I don't share that confidence, so I would like to issue the subpoena immediately and enforce it rigorously," Gaetz said. A Manhattan jury late last month convicted Trump of 34 felony counts of falsifying business records regarding the payment to Daniels during his first presidential campaign in an effort to conceal an alleged 2006 affair. Trump is appealing the verdict and denies that the affair occurred and any wrongdoing, calling the case politically motivated. Since Bragg's investigation of Trump, the district attorney has faced widespread criticism from many Republicans, including Jordan, who's pushing to "examine Alvin Bragg's political prosecution of President Trump" and explore politically motivated state and local prosecutions. Earlier this week, a spokesperson for Bragg's office confirmed to Newsweek that he and Colangelo would be appearing before the House Judiciary Committee on July 12. "The Manhattan D.A.'s Office is proud to play a crucial role in upholding and enforcing the rule of law for the people of New York," the spokesperson told Newsweek. "It undermines the rule of law to spread dangerous misinformation, baseless claims, and conspiracy theories following the jury's return of a full-count felony conviction in People v. Trump. Nonetheless, we respect our government institutions and plan to appear voluntarily before the subcommittee after sentencing." Newsweek reached out to Jordan representatives via email for comment. Start your unlimited Newsweek trial
